title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 520.15 - Rules of the New York State Board of Law Examiners
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 520.15 - Rules of the New York State Board of Law Examiners

State Regulations

The New York State Board of Law Examiners
may from time to time adopt, amend or rescind rules, not inconsistent with
these rules, as it shall deem necessary and proper to enable it to discharge
its duties as such duties are established by law and by these rules. The rules
so established by the board shall not be adopted, amended or rescinded except
by a majority vote of the members thereof. A copy of each rule adopted, amended
or rescinded must, within 30 days of such action, be filed in the Office of the

Secretary of State. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22
ยง
520.15

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
